DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of 3 dose strengths of CT327 ointment (0.05%, 0.1% and 0.05% w/w) compared to a placebo, when applied twice daily for up to 8 weeks, to the psoriatic plaques of patients with psoriasis vulgaris.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy, Safety and Toleration of CT327 Ointment in Patients With Psoriasis Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects aged at least 18 years. Stable psoriasis vulgaris Subjects with guttate, erythrodermic, exfoliative or pustular psoriasis.
